1100011101011111 0110100110010001 0 -> sum: 0011000011110000, cout: 1
0111100110100111 1110000110011101 0 -> sum: 0101101101000100, cout: 1
0000000010101011 0001100011110101 1 -> sum: 0001100110100001, cout: 0
0110100000001100 0101011001000000 0 -> sum: 1011111001001100, cout: 0
1100100101010100 1011100101101111 1 -> sum: 1000001011000100, cout: 1
0100001100100101 1011000001001010 1 -> sum: 1111001101110000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
